resources.string:
S\&P500 index is loaded. It contains 505 issuers, but Finnhub discourages to make more than 30 network requests per second, so the list
is chunked on up to 2 chunks are fetched at a time. If you need more issuers, pull to refresh list to request more. New-York Stock 
Market is open from 16:30 to 2:00 Moscow time (GMT+3). Thus, real-time updates may not be 
available out this period. First load is normally slow, be patient :).
